subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Sepp Blatter said Tuesday that if he is elected to a fourth term as president of FIFA in June, it will be his last. Blatter, 75, has led soccer’s governing body since 1998.
snippet: Sepp Blatter said Tuesday that if he is elected to a fourth term as president of FIFA in June, it will be his last. Blatter, 75, has led soccer’s governing body since 1998.
